    • assignEmployee

      public static int assignEmployee()
      Search the Employee with fewer assigned requests to assign a new one
      Returns:
      The ID of the Employee with fewer assigned requests

    • assignEmployee

      public static int assignEmployee(int id_old_employee)
      Search the Employee with fewer assigned requests to assign a new one. Excludes from the pool the employee ID received in input
      Parameters:
      id_old_employee - The ID of Employee to exclude from the pool
      Returns:
      The ID of the Employee with fewer assigned requests

    • checkAssignationExpired

      public static void checkAssignationExpired(int expiration)
      Check if there are orders with an expired assignation date to assign them to other employees
      Parameters:
      expiration - The number of days to calculate the expiration

      Parameters:
      c - The new Customer
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

    • login

      public static int login(String user, String pwd, Boolean employee)
      Try login by a User
      Parameters:
      user - The username of the User
      pwd - The password of the User
      employee - True if the User is an Employee, false if the User is a Customer
      Returns:
      The unique ID of the user. -1 if the login failed

      Parameters:
      name - The name of the wines
      year - The year of the wines
      Returns:
      The list of filtered wines

    • insertOrder

      public static boolean insertOrder(int quantity, Double price, String type, String state, Date date, int id_wine, int id_employee, int id_customer)
      Send a new Order by a Customer
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity of Wine bottles purchased
      price - The price of Wine bottles
      type - The type of the Order
      state - The state of the Order
      date - The date of the order
      id_wine - The wine ID of the Order
      id_employee - The employee ID of the Order
      id_customer - The customer ID of the Order
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

    • listOrders

      public static ArrayList<wineshop.model.Order> listOrders(String state, Date startDate, Date endDate, int id_customer)
      Search a subset of orders by a Customer
      Parameters:
      state - The state of the orders
      startDate - The start date of the orders
      endDate - The end date of the orders
      id_customer - The customer ID who is searching
      Returns:
      The list of filtered orders

    • responseOrderCustomer

      public static boolean responseOrderCustomer(int id_order, int proposal_delivery, Date date, String state, int review)
      Response to an Order by a Customer
      Parameters:
      id_order - The order ID of the Order
      proposal_delivery - The proposal delivery of the Order
      date - The date of the Order
      state - The state after the Customer choice
      review - The review given by the Customer
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise
